backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles, lobbies, matches, player states, and game sessions with access control and authentication checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list of concise summaries for numerous frontend files describing UI, game logic, hooks, and scenes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page metadata and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/ITCHIO_BUILD.md: Documentation describing how to build for itch.io, including default and configurable output folder names.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling view navigation and wrapping providers for theme, graphics, and debug settings.
frontend/src/game/components/ImpactEffec: Ref-based bullet impact visual effects with periodic cleanup and lightweight rendering.
frontend/src/game/components/PlayerArmsA: First‑person weapon model with recoil, firing logic integration, and camera‑attached positioning.
frontend/src/game/components/RemotePlaye: Remote player avatar mesh with smooth interpolation and a WebGL label.
Canvas‑rendered username label displayed as a Three.js sprite.
frontend/src/game/controls/useFpsControl: Implements FPS camera movement with keyboard, mouse look, jumping, crouching, sprinting, and pointer lock using three.js and react-three-fiber.
frontend/src/game/GameCanvas.tsx: React Three Fiber canvas wrapper applying graphics settings such as DPR, antialiasing, and shadows.
Renders a desert outpost scene with sandy terrain, trees, vegetation, buildings, a watchtower, and a fortified structure based on graphics settings.
frontend/src/game/maps/HarborYardMap.tsx: Builds a harbor yard environment with asphalt ground, perimeter trees, and numerous stacked shipping containers influenced by graphics settings.
frontend/src/game/maps/JungleCompoundMap: Creates a jungle compound featuring dense vegetation, muddy terrain, and multiple wooden elevated platforms adjusted by graphics mode.
frontend/src/game/maps/mapRegistry.ts: Registers available maps with names, descriptions, and components and provides lookup utilities.
frontend/src/game/maps/props/Door.tsx: Reusable door component rendering a frame, door slab, and handle with style-based colors and scaling.
frontend/src/game/maps/props/GroundDetai: Generates randomized grass tuft meshes based on graphics mode, bounds, and density, rendering simple cross‑shaped grass groups.
frontend/src/game/maps/props/LowPolyTree: Renders a low‑poly tree with trunk and cone foliage, varying colors and sizes by variant and supporting shadows.
Defines a training range with concrete terrain, perimeter trees, walls, cover boxes, and small sheds depending on graphics settings.
frontend/src/game/scenes/OfflineSkirmish: Implements an offline shooting scene with moving targets, hit detection via raycasting, and player FPS controls.
frontend/src/game/scenes/OnlineMatchScen: Renders an online match scene with FPS controls, remote players, position syncing, and a map selected from lobby data.
frontend/src/game/scenes/TrainingScene.t: Creates a static training area with walls, cover, targets, and basic firing impact logic using FPS controls.
frontend/src/game/settings/DebugSettings: Context provider storing a toggle for showing a performance overlay, persisted to localStorage.
frontend/src/game/settings/graphics.ts: Defines graphics modes and returns rendering settings such as DPR, antialiasing, and shadow options.
frontend/src/game/settings/GraphicsSetti: Context provider managing the current graphics mode with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/game/settings/useDebugSetti: Hook exposing the debug settings context.
frontend/src/game/settings/useGraphicsSe: Hook exposing the graphics settings context.
frontend/src/game/weapons/offlineWeapons: Defines simple offline weapon configs for rifle and SMG including fire rate, spread, and damage.
frontend/src/game/weapons/useWeapon.ts: Hook managing weapon firing rate and direction based on camera orientation, triggering onFire callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider to manage Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and exposing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for user profiles, lobbies, players, and game actions like joining or starting a lobby.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles, color variables, themes, and custom utility classes for gradients and HUD panels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomeView.tsx: Renders the main menu with background, graphics settings, login, and navigation buttons for game modes.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyView.tsx: Displays active lobbies, allows joining, leaving, selecting maps, and starting games, with authentication and profile checks.
frontend/src/pages/OfflineSkirmishView.t: Runs the offline skirmish game scene, tracks player stats, handles weapon switching, and provides an ESC pause menu.
frontend/src/pages/OnlineGameView.tsx: Renders the online game view with a canvas, HUD, performance overlay, and an ESC menu with navigation and graphics options.
frontend/src/pages/TrainingView.tsx: Displays the training mode scene with HUD, optional performance overlay, and an ESC menu for navigation and settings.
frontend/src/ui/DisclaimerFooter.tsx: Shows a footer with project disclaimer text and a link attribution to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/ui/HudOverlay.tsx: Provides an in-game HUD showing crosshair, stats, sync info, and mode-specific details for training, online, or offline play.
frontend/src/ui/LoginButton.tsx: Button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout with status feedback.
frontend/src/ui/PerformanceOverlay.tsx: Overlays FPS and graphics mode information, updating FPS periodically via requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/ui/ProfileSetupDialog.tsx: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to create a username profile and saving it via backend hooks.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Generates asset URLs that work in both dev and production with optional relative base paths.
frontend/src/utils/errorMessages.ts: Extracts and normalizes user-friendly error messages from various backend and agent error formats.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL and hash parameters, storing and retrieving them from sessionStorage, and syncing persisted values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, fonts, animations, and enabled plugins.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config setting up React plugins, environment variables, path aliases, and build output options.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, constraints, and known issues for the game's development state.
